channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How much do stocks have to drop before trading is halted? The details on market 'circuit breakers'
item.description: Stock futures were down so much on Sunday that trading needed to be halted momentarily.

item.title: U.S. stocks bearing the brunt of trillions in market value losses around the globe
item.description: A global market decline of 13.7% is not nearly as bad as the 17.4% slump in the S&P 500, largely because Europe and Asia outperformed.

item.title: Tesla price target slashed by Dan Ives on Musk brand crisis and 'tariff Armageddon'
item.description: Wedbush analyst Dan Ives' new price target for the electric vehicle maker still implies an upside of nearly 32% from Tesla's Friday close.

item.title: Citi sees this discount retailer as a 'dark horse winner' in global trade war
item.description: Analyst Paul Lejuez upgraded shares to buy from neutral.

item.title: Bernstein says sell General Motors, sees stock falling 20% because of tariffs
